Question: In April 2008, this person was put on the Time 100 most influential people in the world list.
Hints: On 12 September 2007, this person dissolved the government upon the request of Prime Minister Mikhail Fradkov.
She ensured that this person was secretly christened as a baby and she regularly took him to services.
